mdRecord.dcterms:title: Roley T. Akers Cemetery, Alum Ridge
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
Located in a hay field on the side of a hill on the NW side of the intersection of Alum Ridge Rd., White Rock Rd., and Posey Rd. It is 250 yards off the road and can be seen from Indian Valley Rd. It is fenced and bordered on two sides by tall dark green cedar trees. It can be seen with Google Earth.
N 36 56.616' W 080 27.740'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
